ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] Test of ...
ygData.msgSnippet: Please nobody repeat this to anyone but Those in the know have stated to me that the Test of Song is being worked on. Lyrnia ... From: Adam Wasserman
ygData.messageBody:
Please nobody repeat this to anyone but "Those in the know" have stated to
me that the "Test of Song" is being worked on.

Lyrnia

----- Original Message -----
From: "Adam Wasserman" <wassermana@...>
To: <eqbards@egroups.com>
Sent: Tuesday, June 06, 2000 6:21 PM
Subject: RE: [eqbards] Test of ...


> Just to clarify...
>
> The "Test of" events are unavailable to bards. That's why I brought the
> whole thing up. There isn't a single "Test of" that we can participate in.
>
> Draelon
>
> -----Original Message-----
> From: Reece, Tom CPT- 25IDL G4
> [mailto:g4mntofcr@...]
> Sent: Tuesday, June 06, 2000 6:11 PM
> To: eqbards@egroups.com
> Subject: RE: [eqbards] Test of ...
>
>
> In specific terms I was referring to the "Test of" events. If they are
> geared towards rewarding the best bard on the server, then IMO level
should
> not be a factor.
>
> ------------------------------------------------------------------------
> Old school buds here:
> http://click.egroups.com/1/4057/10/_/451022/_/960330106/

> Please send submissions for the eqbards newsletter to lol@...
with the subject submissions.
